question: How long is CWW Tech Africa program?
answer:
The duration depends on the program. We currently have 3 cohort-based programmes. 
 CTA Cohort programmes -Duration of program is 6 weekCTA Bootcamp – 4 weeksCTA Soft skills training – 2 days

question: Is the program remote?
answer: CWW Tech Africa programs are virtual training programs that allow all participants, regardless of location, to actively participate

question: How do I join a CWW Tech Africa program?
answer: To join any of our programs, click on “Apply as a trainee”  on any of our programmes at www.cwwtechafrica.com

question: When will I be notified about the results of my application?
answer: CWW Tech Africa will contact all applicants through email in due course. All successful applicants will be notified

question: Are CWW Tech Africa programmes open to undergraduate students?
Is the CTA Cohort programme free or will there be payment made during the course of the program?
answer: The CTA training program is free for all African youths residing in Africa. However, you are required to pay a non-refundable commitment fee of ₦2000 or 5$. Non-Africans interested in the program will pay a commitment fee of 10$
